title: [管理|安全|经济|网页]PlayGrid —— 吊炸天的全能网页插件[1.5.2-1.6.4]
txt_content:
注意！本帖为指路贴
求翻译求汉化求介绍
总之就是一个超级强大的插件
可以用来一键做服务器官网、论坛
和服务器网页商店
还可以查看玩家统计信息
比如行走路程之类的
还有网页后台什么的
总之就是
超级强大！
英文介绍：

Secure player registration | Instant community site | Web store | Forums | Player managementOverviewScreenshotsInstallationConfiguration
OverviewPlayGrid for Minecraft gives your server a professional account backend that provides these great features with just minutes of setup time:Game web page where your players can register, get the server IP, check server status and see who is online.Online registration and account management. Get a verified email address, name, and minecraft account id for all of your players. They can even sign up for your game using Facebook, Twitter, or Google+.Manage user status including timed suspensions and bans. And you have complete control over user access and permissions depending on player account status.Web store create a web store to sell items that are automatically delivered to your players.Integrated forums for your players to discuss your server, suggest ideas, and get support.
And coming soon:Automated server monitoring and sms notifications to alert you if your server goes down.Require players to agree to your Terms of Use statement.Home page CMS providing customized layouts, widgets, themes, sub-pages and content.Assign other users as delegates who can manage your games / users
ScreenshotsCreate a professional home page for your server in seconds:customize key image and textSee a list of recent playersNews feed of recent announcementsCheck server status and get server IP addressView the latest player leaderboardSignup and manage account
--------------------------------------------------Create a web store to sell in-game items and ranks:Easily setup an integrated web-store to sell in-game items and ranksNo fees: receive funds directly by connecting your PayPal accountPlayGridMC automatically delivers purchased items to your playersSpecify item delivery using any combination of server console commands
--------------------------------------------------Fully integrated forums to engage your community:Make game announcements that are displayed on your home pageOnly registered players can participate in the forumsBanned and suspended players are also banned on forumsPopular defualt forums with forum customization coming soon
--------------------------------------------------Instant game dashboard allows you to monitor and configure your server settings:Check server statusGet the latest pluginMonitor and manage your playersView vital server statistics
--------------------------------------------------Manage your players with an easy to use web interface:Send mail to your registered playersAssign individual players to permission groups you setup using PermissionsEx or just about any other permission pluginSuspend players for a limted timeBan players indefinitelyThe PlayGrid plugin automatically tracks player settings and allows or kicks players according to a number of detailed settings you can manage
--------------------------------------------------Complete control over player access and permissions:Optionally require users to signup or verify their email address before joining your serverGive users unregistered users trial access to your server and assign trial users to a specific permission groupBanned and Suspended players are kicked by default but you can also allow players with either status to join but be placed in a permission group with limited permissionsGrant specialized groups to VIP playersEasily view and manage your groups and players assigned to each group
--------------------------------------------------Display a dynamic leaderboard to motivate your players:
works in conjunction with Lolmewn's popular Stats pluginDisplay a player leaderboard on your home pageChoose among the available stats which stats to display on your leaderboardDesignate a primary stat that will dictacte leaderboard rankings
--------------------------------------------------Complete account control for you and your players:Manage multiple email addressAdd your mobile number to enable mobile push notifications (coming soon)Manage minecraft accounts associated with each user's players

可是CrazyLogin xAuth AuthME 都是用/register 注册的 这就会造成冲突

可是CrazyLogin xAuth AuthME 都 ...
怎么用啊...

lzjluzijie 发表于 2014-1-13 18:51 
怎么用啊...
1.Install and run CraftBukkit (http://dl.bukkit.org/downloads/craftbukkit/list/rb/)
2.Install Vault plugin (http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/vault/)
3.Add the PlayGridMC.jar plugin to your plugins directory.
4.Restart your server to unpack the PlayGrid config file.
5.Go to http://www.playgrid.com. Create an account, add your game, and copy your secret token.
6.Open /plugins/PlayGridMC/config.yml and paste your secret key into the secret_key config option.
7.Restart your server.
8.You’re done! Make sure you have a valid mincraft account associated with your PlayGrid account and a verified email address. When you login to your server, your player will be authenticated with your new account platform!
额 刚才看了一下  这个插件是链接国外网站的 至于汉化问题 是基本不可能的 因为文件都是在国外网站上  除非把那个playgrid整个网站全搞下来。。。这就是个第三方网站系统。。。玩家每次都需要登陆到国外网站  网速卡的话 基本就没用了。。。

replies.txt_content:
特征
你的服务器得到即时的网站
自定义的外观和感觉您的网站
显示像服务器状态和球员的重要信息
无限添加页面的内容到您的网站
功能齐全的论坛系统，玩家的讨论
你的playgrid网站链接你的域
或将playgrid到您现有的网站
控制谁有权访问你的服务器上玩
自动授予访问权限的人
或要求玩家注册
或要求玩家请求访问
禁止或暂停播放问题
基于登记的权限分配
你的员工和管理者的特殊成员组
创建一个玩家可以购买的物品目录
募捐
将你的个人的PayPal账户来接收付款
如VIP会员的权益出售
提供任何类型的项目的交付与强大的脚本系统
展示你的店在你的首页
使用权利创造玩家行列
将基于玩家的权利附加权限
随意使权利到期
添加用户的权利purchaseprofessional售票系统商店允许玩家提交的支持请求
得到一个电子邮件通知时，一张票了
响应来自你的仪表板票或通过电子邮件
创造一个团队的工作人员谁可以处理的支持请求
把所有这些特征的自由
捐赠店里不费
24小时免费支持
所有我们要问的是，你帮我们做了playgrid伟大
